name: Rayman
overview: The legendary first Rayman adventure now on Nintendo DSiWare. • Play Rayman and try to save his amazing world from the evil Mr Dark! • Discover a charming universe with colourful landscapes and meet funny characters who will help Rayman through his quest! • Experiment with his abilities and punch, hang or fly in the air. • Take advantage of the new Nintendo DSi features like the Nintendo DSi cameras and touch map selection!
